# The `UniqueMachineInstr` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A class that wraps MachineInstrs and derives from <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a368e3de8ea854f34bc97c21a64d6a164">FoldingSetNode</a> in order to be uniqued in a CSEMap. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A class that wraps MachineInstrs and derives from <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a368e3de8ea854f34bc97c21a64d6a164">FoldingSetNode</a> in order to be uniqued in a CSEMap.

The tradeoff here is extra memory allocations for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/uniquemachineinstr">UniqueMachineInstr</a> vs making <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> bigger.

Definition at line 30 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-h">CSEInfo.h</a>.
